entry.title: Hidden warnings; using topic modeling on Yelp reviews to predict health inspection violations
entry.content:
A deep dive into the predictive power of Supervised Latent Dirichlet Allocation on text reviews to detect food safety concerns.

PDF Github

Hidden warnings; using topic modeling on Yelp reviews to predict health inspection violations was originally published by Michael Bostwick at Michael on May 03, 2017.

entry.title: Yelp review text recommender system
entry.content:
My first foray into text mining to build a modified recommender system with reduced sparsity.

Github

Yelp review text recommender system was originally published by Michael Bostwick at Michael on December 03, 2016.

entry.title: Journal article in Vaccine
entry.content:
Contributed data processing and calculation of estimates for article: “Knowledge of influenza vaccination recommendation and early vaccination uptake during the 2015–16 season among adults aged ≥18 years – United States”

Journal

Journal article in Vaccine was originally published by Michael Bostwick at Michael on August 01, 2016.

entry.title: Impact of Survey Device on Response to an Early Season Influenza Vaccination Survey
entry.content:
Compared responses on Mobile vs Tablet vs Computer devices to National Internet Flu Survey for CDC. Presented findings at American Association for Public Opinion Research (AAPOR) 2016 conference.

PDF

Impact of Survey Device on Response to an Early Season Influenza Vaccination Survey was originally published by Michael Bostwick at Michael on May 15, 2016.

entry.title: Fit for Purpose
entry.content:
Evaluated suitability of web panel survey compared to traditional large-scale surveys for early-season flu vaccination estimation for CDC. Presented findings at AAPOR 2015 conference.

PDF

Fit for Purpose was originally published by Michael Bostwick at Michael on May 15, 2015.

entry.title: College Scorecard
entry.content:
Programmed data processing scripts for the Department of Education’s inaugural edition of the College Scorecard.

Website

College Scorecard was originally published by Michael Bostwick at Michael on May 01, 2015.
